      • insertPost

        @PostMapping("/newpost")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> insertPost​(@RequestBody
                                                                          PostDTO postDTO)
                                                                   throws InvalidIdException,
                                                                          PostIdAlreadyExistsException
        Inserts a new standard post (non promo)
        Parameters:
        postDTO - The standard Post that want to be persisted
        Throws:
        InvalidIdException - If the userId entered does not correspond to an existing user
        PostIdAlreadyExistsException - If the entered postId already exists

                                                                               PostIdAlreadyExistsException

      • getFollowedMerchantsPosts

        @GetMapping("/followed/{userId}/list")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<PostCollectionDTO>> getFollowedMerchantsPosts​(@PathVariable
                                                                                                            int userId,
                                                                                                            @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="date_desc")
                                                                                                            java.lang.String order)
                                                                                                     throws InvalidIdException
        Obtains all the posts published in the last 2 weeks by the sellers to which the entered user follows
        Parameters:
        userId - Corresponding to the user from whom you want to obtain the posts of his followed sellers
        order - The chronological order in which you want to obtain the results. This order can be ascending or descending
        Returns:
        The posts published in the last 2 weeks by the sellers to which the entered user follows, with the userId and userName of each seller
        Throws:
        InvalidIdException - If the userId entered does not correspond to an existing user

public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PromoPostsDTO> getMerchantNumberOfPromoPosts​(@PathVariable
                                                                                            int userId)
                                                                                     throws InvalidIdException
        Obtains the number of promotional posts that a user has
        Parameters:
        userId - Corresponding to the user from whom you want to obtain the count of promotional posts
        Returns:
        The count of promotional posts that a user has
        Throws:
        InvalidIdException - If the userId entered does not correspond to an existing user

        @GetMapping("/{userId}/list")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PostCollectionDTO> getMerchantPromoPosts​(@PathVariable

                                                                                 throws InvalidIdException
        Obtains the list of the promotional posts that a user has
